issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
hiveserver2 is start seeing the memory pressure once the cachedUnionStructObjectInspector start going 

[https://github.com/apache/hive/blob/master/serde/src/java/org/apache/hadoop/hive/serde2/objectinspector/ObjectInspectorFactory.java#L345]

I did not see any eviction policy for cachedUnionStructObjectInspector, so we should implement some size or time-based eviction policy. 

  !Screen Shot 2018-06-11 at 2.01.00 PM.png!
fields.summary: HiveServer2 ObjectInspectorFactory memory leak with cachedUnionStructObjectInspector
